User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928221717

Steps to reproduce:

I clicked on a link in TweetDeck (version 0.38.1) which caused the target URL to open in a new Firefox tab.


Actual results:

The page loaded as expected, however after opening any browser menus (including the right-click menu and the File/Edit/View etc menus in the main toolbar), hovering over the menu causes it to immediately disappear. This problem persisted until minimising and then restoring the browser window.


Expected results:

The menu should have stayed visible when moving my mouse over it.
